data.title: Jerry Goldsmith Vinyl Record Albums
data.text:

Original Motion Picture Soundtrack / Jerry Goldsmith

Alien

1979

T-593

20th Century Fox Record Label; Still sealed (unopened); Part of the shrink wrap is torn away at the bottom edge of the album cover; Music composed and conducted by Jerry Goldsmith; Track listing: Main Title; The Face Hugger; Breakaway; Acid Test; The Landing; The Droid; The Recovery; The Alien Planet; The Shaft; End Title

SS

Sold

VG+/VG+

J. Gittis; Love Theme From Chinatown (End Title)
